allow: Bash(AWS_REGION=us-east-1 JWT_SECRET_NAME=pdf-converter/jwt-secret bundle exec rspec --format progress)
Bash(AWS_REGION=us-east-1 bundle exec rspec spec/unit/image_uploader_spec.rb --format documentation)
Bash(AWS_REGION=us-east-1 bundle exec rspec spec/integration/ --format documentation)
Bash(AWS_REGION=us-east-1 bundle exec rspec spec/integration/ --format progress)
Bash(LOCALSTACK_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:4566 AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_REGION=us-east-1 bundle exec rspec spec/integration/localstack_integration_spec.rb --format documentation)
